DOC.brief_summary: This study do evaluate delaying cord clamp milk umbilical cord preterm infant health benefit baby . Timing clamp cord varies among doctor , information show delay clamp umbilical cord premature infant may reduce rate baby need blood transfusion , decrease risk infection bleed head .
DOC.brief_title: Delayed Umbilical Cord Clamping Versus Cord Milking Preterm Neonate
DOC.criteria: Singleton multiple pregnancies patient admit medically indicated delivery advance spontaneous preterm labor imminent delivery 24 0/7 28 6/7 week gestation Women age 18 older Planned vaginal breech delivery Major fetal abnormality ( define lethal require prenatal postnatal surgery ) Fetal death utero Red cell isoimmunization Patients incapable informed consent ( unconscious , severely ill , mentally handicap ) , unwilling undergo randomization Placenta previa know abnormal placentation ( e.g . placenta accreta )
